name: Aldric Galewarden

appearance.short: A broad-shouldered Nord with icy blue eyes and a controlled half-smirk. Long dark hair with a heavy braid, a small hoop earring, and wrapped forearms like a brawler. Practical thief leathers with subtle purple accents, worn with the posture of a fallen noble who learned faster rules in the streets.
appearance.detailed: Aldric Galewarden looks like Riften’s fog taught a nobleman how to survive. His eyes are pale, icy blue—steady and sharp in a way that makes people feel measured. Dark hair falls to his shoulders with a thick braid draped forward, and a small hoop earring adds a touch of streetlord flair. A neat beard frames a strong jaw, more refined than wild, like he still remembers what courtrooms smell like. His build is athletic and combat-ready: defined arms and forearms emphasized by cloth wraps, the kind worn by men who fight up close and win. He wears layered leather-and-cloth travel gear in muted greys and browns with subtle purple accents and a sash, secured by practical harness straps and metal clasps—half thief utility, half old family pride. The overall impression is dangerously handsome, calm, and competent: a friendly smile that still warns you not to get cute.
